node.title: Album of birdsongs created by a Darwin PhD student soars to top five of ARIA charts
node.alt: A cockatoo with grey body and red head.
node.description: An album made up entirely of tweets and squawks from Australian birds makes history by entering the Top Five ARIA album charts, surpassing Mariah Carey and Taylor Swift.
node.content:
["An album made up entirely of\u00a0tweets and squawks\u00a0from Australian\u00a0birds\u00a0has made history by entering\u00a0the Top Five ARIA album charts, surpassing Mariah Carey and Taylor Swift.\u00a0", "Titled Songs of Disappearance, the album features birdsongs of 53 of the rarest species in Australia that are on the brink of extinction.\u00a0", "It\u00a0is the first album of its kind to chart in the ARIA Top Five albums, and\u00a0has sold more than 2,100 copies.\u00a0", "Anthony Albrecht,\u00a0a PhD student at Charles Darwin University (CDU) and co-founder of The Bowerbird Collective,\u00a0is part of a group of academics, musicians and conservationists behind the project.", "\"It's absolutely incredible to have knocked Michael Buble, Mariah Carey and a whole bunch of other really famous artists out of the ARIA charts,\" he said.", "\"In some ways, it's not surprising, because I believe Australians generally are so much more attuned now to the environmental crisis that we're all facing \u2014\u00a0and that the unique and incredible species that also call Australia home are facing.\"", "The title track, arranged by Simone Slattery, includes all 53 of the endangered species featured in the\u00a0album.\u00a0", "", "
Simone Slattery is one of the co-founders of The Bowerbird Collective.(Supplied: The Bowerbird Collective)
", "The tracks were\u00a0recorded by\u00a0David Stewart Nature Sound, a wildlife sound recordist, over his decades-long career.", "Mr Stewart's collection consists of thousands of bird calls he has recorded over a period of 40 years, while\u00a0travelling across remote parts of Australia.", "\"Some of the recordings are so brief because he [Mr Stewart] waited hours out in the bush to hear a peep out of some of these species,\" Mr Albrecht said.", "", "
Ms Slattery and Mr Albrecht helped create the album.(Supplied: The Bowerbird Collective)
", "Mr Albrecht said he was pleased Songs of Disappearance\u00a0resonated with so many Australians.", "\"I think it's incredibly important to tell stories about nature in a way that is going to get people really emotionally involved,\" he said.\u00a0", "Stephen Garnett, a co-creator of the album and professor of conservation at CDU, helped produce a landmark extinction report from BirdLife Australia that inspired the project.", "\"They've been singing for millions of years \u2026 and now they're going, and there's a whole lot that we're not going to have with us if we don't do something about them.\"", "Proceeds from the album's sales will go towards BirdLife Australia's conservation efforts.", "", "
Professor Garnett said birds were the \"original artists\"(ABC News: Jane Bardon)
"]
